name: The Beaver Hero Full Edition
description:
The Beaver Hero Full edition has arrived!!! Just REPAIR the dam and enjoy a new whole experience!

- Enjoy 36 levels of full arcade action!

- Discover the story behind!

- There are 36+ different songs!

- Approximately 20 minutes to 1 hour of gameplay!

- Original concept!

- Addicting experience!

- For Free!!
